title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 October 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 07:56): Drafts.XWikiWebDAV was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/XWikiWebDAV  
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 07:56): Drafts.XWikiWebDAV was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/XWikiWebDAV  
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 07:57): Drafts.XWikiWebDAV was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/XWikiWebDAV  
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 07:57): Drafts.XWikiWebDAV was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/XWikiWebDAV  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 10:37): whats the default user/pass for admin in the current svn? has it changed?  
jvdrean - (27/10/2008 10:41): phreeza: you mean the default password for XWiki.Admin in our distributions ?  
jvdrean - (27/10/2008 10:41): phreeza: Admin / admin  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 10:42): hm... yea i just realized i still have to install the XAR on my fresh build... thats where the User is, right?   
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 10:51): XWiki.Fabrice was modified by XWiki.Fabrice (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Fabrice  
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 10:51): XWiki.Fabrice was modified by XWiki.Fabrice (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Fabrice  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:01): phreeza: yes  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:14): vmassol:thanks. is there a reason downloading the plugins with maven is so slow? it always takes ages for me, even though the files are tiny  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:15): phreeza: you can use a mirror  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:15): note: it's fast for me  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:21): vmassol: ah yea using a spanish mirror is a lot faster for me, too. i though the stuff was coming from xwiki.org servers, didn't realize they were being mirrored  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:21): phreeza: we have a repo but only for our stuff  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:21): the maven stuff comes from the maven repo  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:21): s/maven repo/central maven repo/  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:22): (in some future we'll publish our artifacts to the central maven repo)  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:24): vmassol: is it the intended behaviour that building the .war just pulls the jar from the xwiki-core and is not checking for changes in the source files?  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:25): phreeza: all the dependencies are binary in Maven  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:26): you could read http://blogs.codehaus.org/people/vmassol/archives/000953\_binary\_dependency\_builds.html or the maven book at http://www.sonatype.com/community/definitive\_guide.html  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:27): vmassol: ok... it doesn't really bother me, i was just surprised. might read that later but as long as things are working i'll just go with it...  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:27): it's also described here AFAIR: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Building  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:28): o i thought i read that page... not very thouroughly though hehe  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:32): vmassol: another question while we are at it. when running the unit tests i see lots of stacktraces scrolling by which seem like they are errors, but they get counted as passed tests. is that normal?  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:32): vmassol: iirc that was even happening when i just compiled the freshly co'ed code  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:34): phreeza: yes it's "normal". We need to fix the tests so that they don't output it but it's not easy.   
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:35): these are tests have either not set the full environment context or that test for failure conditions  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:35): but the tests are fine  
vmassol - (27/10/2008 11:35): it's just that you shouldn't see the stacktraces  
phreeza - (27/10/2008 11:35): okay :)  
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 14:04): Design.OfficeConverter was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/OfficeConverter  
xwikibot - (27/10/2008 14:05): Design.OfficeConverter was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/OfficeConverter
